prompt: A rare enchanted artifact known as the Eldritch Lantern, nestled in the heart of a mystical swamp. The lantern is made of ancient, gnarled wood intertwined with glowing blue and green vines. It hovers slightly above the ground, emitting an eerie, soft light that cuts through the surrounding mist. The swamp itself is filled with dark, twisted trees and luminescent plants, with ghostly fireflies dancing around. The overall scene feels both enchanting and foreboding, capturing the magical essence of the swamp.
